item.title: github: New features and improvements in GitHub Copilot in JetBrains IDEs
item.description:
GitHub Copilot for JetBrains IDEs received an update adding preview support for Agent Skills plus UX improvements in inline chat and settings.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: New repository settings for configuring pull request access
item.description:
GitHub added two new repository settings to control how a repo accepts contributions via pull requests, including an option to disable pull requests entirely.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Teams management now moved to Settings
item.description:
GitHub moved Teams management out of the left-hand navigation into a dedicated page under Settings to simplify navigation and surface other important features more easily.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Improved blocked users view in organization and personal settings
item.description:
GitHub updated the blocked users view in organization and personal settings to provide improved transparency and easier record keeping, giving organization admins clearer visibility into moderation history and context.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Security contact for security notification emails is generally available
item.description:
GitHub now allows enterprise admins to set a dedicated contact email for security incident notifications from the enterprise account Settings > Profile. This optional field is generally available and enables more targeted delivery of security-related emails.

  • Source: GitHub
